title: No, actor Naseeruddin Shah is NOT hospitalised; Here’s the Fact Check | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
After the shocking demise of actors Irrfan Khan and Rishi Kapoor, on consecutive days, claims about actor Naseeruddin Shah being hospitalised started surfacing on the social media.

Several posts claiming Shah’s death also emerged on the internet.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above posts and found them to be fake.

We checked and did not find any credible media reports to support these claims.

We then checked the social media for any statements from his family members and found a tweet by his son, Vivaan Shah.

“Baba’s just fine. All the rumours about his health are fake,” he tweeted.

Hence, it is abundantly clear that the news of actor Naseeruddin Shah being hospitalised is fake.
